name: Potato Knight: Loading Process
description:
Game Made For The 176# Trijam

After The Knight ate his meal he went to rescue the princess!

But the adventure is full of twists which the knight did not expect.

Arrows To Move

Space To Jump

And yes the wall jump is back but you can hold against a wall and spam the arrow keys and space.

Font Made By Chequered Ink, Knight Made By 0x72.

(the ending is rushed beacuse i dint have enough time)
